title: NAMI BUG FOR OVER A YEAR on her CHROMAS !!!! @riotKateyKhaos
body:
The bug isn't listed as fixed in the notes?

Her Chromas do not use the particles for the skin. Koi Nami particles are purple iridescent thing going on which is not present in her Chromas only works on Koi itself

replies.body: Actually, this should be fixed soon!
